title: Teemo bug
body: As I've been giving back to the community by playing teemo in ranked this pre season I may have discovered a bug. When an enemy ward dies (either times out or is destroyed) is will make a teemo shroom activate and explode if the two are close to each other. Is this meant to happen? Haven't tried it with ally wards. Also I'm 4-0 with teeto this pre season.

replies.body: Because Wards trigger as units now i believe (because unit collision is so annoying with wards right now) when they are non-invisible they would trigger anything a unit would.
send them a letter at there support page
Wards shouldn't be blowing up shrooms.
